outline:
1. (Qal) murmur, roar, crowd, abundance, tumult, sound
    1. sound, murmur, rush, roar
    2. tumult, confusion
    3. crowd, multitude
    4. great number, abundance
    5. abundance, wealth
kjv_def: abundance, company, many, multitude, multiply, noise, riches, rumbling, sounding, store, tumult.
strongs_def: a noise, tumult, crowd; also disquietude, wealth
